title: Why do i have 100 fps with a 1070?
body: Hey guys, I have been having a problem with my pc since I build it when I play league i only get around 100 fps on ultra settings which I know is not good at all. I nearly have the same specs as my friend and he gets around 300 fps per game and I have never seen a number close to that on my pc. I have tried everything from reinstalling my drivers to changing where my fans are plugged into my pc. I find it weird as well that my CPU's temperature is around 40 when I don't do anything. The reason I decided to post this on the league forums is that I haven't seen anyone else with this problem and it doesn't seem to affect anything else than league of legends. My specs are i5 7600k and an Asus 1070. If you have had this problem I would love to hear if you found a solution <3.

replies.body: Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case your settings and drivers might need a tune up or update, though reinstalling drivers was a good step.  Your [PC can be too good ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs)as well, so try capping your frame rate in-game to see if that helps!
I tried to run through the fps issues but nothing really helped me and I also tried to cap my fps but that didn't help me either. any other suggestions?

Our tech team can work with you individually on this and find some options best fit for you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
